Start: ^Charlotte is reading to herself in the library, sitting on the sofa.
Browsing: ^Charlotte observes you and invites you to sit down.
Reading: ^Charlotte discusses reading with you, talks preferences.
^You learn that she is the one who maintains the recommendations and usually does them herself.
Confessions: ^Charlotte admits that, while she is an avid reader, when she reads in public she does so so that she can watch people without looking suspicious.
Trissa: ^You can discuss her relationship with her roommate.
